title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
OB: The report design currently stores the absolute path for the included library. This can be observed in the <property> element, where the 'fileName' attribute contains an absolute path: 'E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary'. The 'namespace' property also shows the name of the library: 'lib1'.
EB: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path. When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path. For example, if the report design is located at $project/test, the relative path should be used.
